name: Arcana Crystal
effect: Expend a charge when you use a spell for one of the following effects:\r\nSeeking. If it’s a spell attack, gain +1 ACC on the attack rolls.\r\nPotent. If it has a save, increase the save target by +2.

name: Armor, Heavy
effect: +3 Armor (to a max of +4). -1 Speed and Dodge

name: Armor, Light
effect: +1 Armor (to a max of +4).

name: Armor, Medium
effect: +2 Armor (to a max of +4). -1 Dodge

name: Battering Ram
effect: Whenever you Push or Slide an ally or enemy, you can move them +2 spaces. Your Save Target is increased by +2. As a Minor Action, you can either Push an adjacent character 1 space or deal [10 Piercing Physical] to an adjacent piece of cover.

name: Caltrops
effect: Expend a charge to use one of the following options:\nNails. [Thrown 5] Throw at a character within range. On Hit, they take [1 Piercing Physical] for every space they move during their next turn.\nSpikes. [Trap] When triggered, the trap creates a [Blast 1] zone centered on itself that lasts until the end of this phase in the next round. Whenever a character starts their turn in the zone or enters it for the first time in a turn, they take [1d6 Piercing Physical].

name: Climbing Gear
effect: Climbing costs half as much movement as normal. When you climb, you can bring a willing adjacent ally with you as long as there is enough space for both of you to stand.

name: Companion
effect: (Tags: Summon, Size ½, 5 HP, 10 Dodge/A-def)\nAs a Minor Action, you summon your companion, which can be a beast, friend, or anything else willing to aid you in combat. Your companion is summoned in a free space within Scope. 1/turn when you attack a character adjacent to your companion, the companion deals [3 Physical] to them.\nYour companion can only be dismissed with a Minor Action. It keeps its current HP value when dismissed, and regains all HP during a REST. If defeated, this support item is destroyed.

name: Explosive Materials
effect: Choose either Physical, Astral, Lunar, or Force damage when you equip this item. Expend a charge to use one of the following options:\nExplosive Bomb: [Thrown 5] When thrown, create a [Blast 1] area at the target space. All characters in the area must pass an AGI save or take [1d6 Damage] of the chosen damage type.\nExplosive Trap. When triggered, create a [Burst 1] area. All characters in the area take [6 Damage] of the chosen damage type.

name: Healing Potion
effect: Spend a recovery and regain all of your HP.

name: Lore Book
effect: Minor: You can identify an enemy unit in the scene. You learn all of their statistics and abilities.

name: Mana Potion
effect: Regain all your mana.

name: Poison
effect: Expend a charge when you hit with a weapon attack. The target must pass a BLK save or take [2 Stress], get MARKED, and be DAZED until the end of their next turn.

name: Resistance Enchantment
effect: Any Armor: You gain Resistance to Physical, Astral, Lunar, or Force damage (chosen when you equip this enchantment).\r\nAny Weapon or Skill/Spell Attack: This ability ignores Physical, Astral, Lunar, or Force Resistances (chosen when you equip this enchantment).\r

name: Resistance Potion
effect: Gain Resistance to Physical, Astral, Lunar, and Force damage until the end of your next turn.

name: Shield
effect: 1/round as a Reaction when you take Physical, Astral, Lunar, or Force or when you take that damage as part of the INTERPOSE reaction, you can take [2 Stress] to gain Resistance to that damage.

name: Shield, Tower
effect: Allied characters gain the benefits of cover as if you were a piece of Hard Cover.\r\n1/round as a Reaction when you take Physical, Astral, Lunar, or Force or when you take that damage as part of the INTERPOSE reaction, you can take [2 Stress] to gain Resistance to that damage.

name: Smoke Charges
effect: Expend a charge to use one of the following options:\r\nSmoke Bomb. [Thrown 5] When thrown, create a [Blast 2] zone at the target space that lasts until the end of your next turn. The zone grants Soft Cover to anything fully within the zone.\r\nSmokestick. [Trap] When triggered, creates a [Burst 3] zone that lasts until the end of this Phase in the next Round. The zone grants Soft Cover to anything fully within the zone.

name: Stoneskin Potion
effect: You gain 1d3+2 Focus.

name: Sunrod
effect: You ignore all low visibility penalties. This effect is always active while equipped and remains even if this item has no charges. Expend a charge to use the following:\r\nFlash Bomb. [Thrown 5] When thrown, create a [Blast 1] area on the target space. All characters in the area must pass a BLK save or be BLINDED until the end of their next turn.

name: Supply Convoy
effect: You have -1 Speed while this item has charges. You or adjacent allies can use a Minor Action to expend a charge from this support item and either a) regain all their mana, b) regain all their HP, c) clear all their stress, or d) repair one of their destroyed pieces of equipment or techniques.

name: Thieves Tools
effect: You can automatically open locks as a Free Action. You can attempt to disable HIDDEN traps, and have +1 ACC when disabling traps or on saves triggered by traps.

name: Water Maneuverability
effect: You move normally in liquid-based Difficult Terrain, and have an Aquatic Adaptation.

name: Whetstone
effect: Expend a charge when you hit with a weapon attack. You deal the weapon’s maximum damage. Bonus damage and other effects are rolled normally.

name: Wire Charges
effect: Expend a charge to use one of the following options:\r\nWire Knot. [Thrown 5] Throw at a character within range. On Hit, they must pass an AGI save or be IMMOBILIZED until the end of their next turn.\r\nWire Trap. [Trap] When triggered, creates a [Burst 1] area. All characters in the area must pass an AGI save or be IMMOBILIZED until the end of their next turn.
